data.system_settings: Nexus 5X, Android 7.1.1, Pure Nexus ROM, Discord Alpha 3.6.5
data.actual_result: The emoji doesn't show up in the suggestions box unless you type it by its "proper" name, and certain aliases like :+1: won't show up in the message
data.expected_result: The emoji alias shows up in the suggestions box and shows up in the submitted message, like on PC and older versions of the Discord mobile client
data.short_description: System emoji only show up by their proper names, not by aliases, in their suggestion box
data.steps_to_repro: - Type an alternate name for an emoji in the message box (like :rofl: for 🤣, or :+1: for thumbs_up) - Submit the message
